column4: Sometimes my tray indicators start up mangled, requiring reboot.  Can someone look at this picture and tell me why?:    http://dl.dropbox.com/u/587338/mangled_indicators.png
since that is gnome and not kde you might get a better answer in #ubuntu.. however there may be others here that can also answer that question.
sorry.. Thought I was in the kubutnu channel :)
